entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 15 this evening then steady. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023
